author: bayard
msg: removed BrowseProject.jspa from the urls. While this now takes the reader to the dashboard and not the browse project page, it makes it more future-proof. The reason for changing was that the CSS was not loading correctly without the secure/ in the url. An alternative would be to add secure/, but that seems more likely to have these issues again than just sending them to the dashboard
